defaultPageSetup.name: HTML Washer
defaultPageSetup.title: HTML cleanup tool & simplifier
defaultPageSetup.description: An online tool that reduces HTML to basic tags and attributes. Removes scripts, CSS, and other non-basic elements like <object>, <canvas>, etc… Also, corrects errors and formats the HTML doc or a fragment.
defaultPageSetup.searchEngineTitle: HTML cleanup tool & simplifier. For basic & clean HTML
defaultPageSetup.searchEngineDescription: Reduces HTML to basic tags and attributes. Removes scripts, CSS, and other non-basic elements like <object>,  <canvas>, etc… Also, it corrects errors.

intro.title: HTML cleanup tool & simplifier
intro.bodyHtml: HTML Washer is a tool which reduces a HTML document (or fragment) to basic HTML tags and attributes – clean HTML

headerMenu.caption: HTML
headerMenu.tooltip: HTML and it's history, from sixties to HTML5
